skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 20% chance of placing a [Freeze] debuff for 1 turn. Damage inflicted is proportional to DEF.
skills.name: Shatter
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Has a 75% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff on all enemies for 2 turns. Also has a 55% chance of decreasing each target's Turn Meter by 20%.
skills.name: Subjugate
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.desc:
Attacks at random 4 times. Each attack has a 30% chance of placing a [Block Active Skills] debuff for 2 turns. 

The chance of the [Block Active Skills] debuff increases to 100% if the target is under a [Decrease ATK] debuff.
